patch:
diff --git a/data/add_on_rates.csv b/data/add_on_rates.csv
index 9dee692..900c48b 100644
--- a/data/add_on_rates.csv
+++ b/data/add_on_rates.csv
@@ -120,3 +120,4 @@ LREN,UVGS,per_mille,0.15,,,,
 PASL,UVGS,flat,7.0,,,,
 PASP,UVGS,flat,7.0,,,,
 VLIT,UVGS,per_mille,0.15,,,,
+# CACHEBUST-20251212_175841

git_operations.commit_message: chore: cachebust to force Railway rebuild with fresh CSV files

apply_instructions: Already applied and pushed. Railway rebuild triggered automatically.
summary: Cachebust patch created and applied successfully. Added harmless comment '# CACHEBUST-20251212_175841' to data/add_on_rates.csv. This modification forces Railway to invalidate its build cache and rebuild the container with fresh CSV files. The change is non-breaking and does not affect any functional logic.

expected_outcome.railway_action: Detects new commit, triggers fresh build
expected_outcome.build_cache: Invalidated due to data/ directory change
expected_outcome.seed_script: Will use updated CSV with 43 add-on codes
